{{Infobox dungeon |name = Fiery Path |image = [[File:Fiery Path.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Fiery Path |tokens = 17,000 |location = North of Mauville City, East of Lavaridge Town. }} '''Fiery Path''' is a dungeon in [[Hoenn]].
==Details==

{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 224,000 |- | Boss || 700,000 |}
